languages.text: "Провожу обработку полученной информации. Восстанавливаю пробелы в данных... Готово". {n}Из вокс-системы Паскаля доносится чуть измененный голос жреца:{/n} "О Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}, посланни{mf|к|ца} Бога-орла, услышь мольбы слуги твоего, обращенные сквозь мириады лесов Кетца Темера! Кошмар стал явью, тьма покинула лес. Но свет угасающей звезды еще можно спасти! Сердце леса взывает к вам..."

traits.locale_text: "Провожу обработку полученной информации. Восстанавливаю пробелы в данных... Готово". {n}Из вокс-системы Паскаля доносится чуть измененный голос жреца:{/n} "О Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}, посланни{mf|к|ца} Бога-орла, услышь мольбы слуги твоего, обращенные сквозь мириады лесов Кетца-аль Хета! Кошмар стал явью, тьма покинула лес. Но свет угасающей звезды еще можно спасти! Сердце леса взывает к вам..."

languages.text: "Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."
languages.original_text: "Провожу обработку полученной информации. Восстанавливаю пробелы в данных... Готово". {n}Из вокс-системы Паскаля доносится чуть измененный голос жреца:{/n} "О Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}, посланни{mf|к|ца} Бога-орла, услышь мольбы слуги твоего, обращенные сквозь мириады лесов Кетца Темера! Кошмар стал явью, тьма покинула лес. Но свет угасающей звезды еще можно спасти! Сердце леса взывает к вам..."

traits.locale_text: "Processing acquired data. Filling the blanks in the data... Completed." {n}The slightly changed voice of the priest sounds from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriads of the forests of Quetza Temer!" "The nightmare has become real, the darkness left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

"Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

languages.text: «Procesando datos adquiridos. Restaurando... Restauración completada». {n}La voz del sacerdote, levemente modificada, procede ahora del vocotransmisor de Pasqal:{/n} «¡Oh, {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas, {mf|Emisario|Emisaria} Celestial del Dios Águila, escucha la plegaria que tu siervo te envía a través de la miríada de bosques de Quetza Temer! La pesadilla se ha hecho realidad: la oscuridad ha abandonado el bosque. ¡Pero la luz de la estrella moribunda aún puede salvarse! El corazón del bosque te convoca...».
languages.original_text: "Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

traits.locale_text: «Procesando datos adquiridos. Llenando espacios en blanco... Completado». {n}La voz del sacerdote, levemente modificada, procede ahora del vocotransmisor de Pasqal:{/n} «¡Oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas, {mf|Emisario|Emisaria} Celestial del Dios Águila, escucha la plegaria que tu siervo te envía a través de la miríada de bosques de Quetza Temer! La pesadilla se ha hecho realidad, la oscuridad ha abandonado el bosque. ¡Pero la luz de la estrella moribunda aún puede salvarse! El corazón del bosque te convoca...

languages.text: “正在处理已获取的数据，正在恢复数据……已恢复。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置响了起来，他的声音略有变化。{/n}“噢，星裔，鹰神的圣使，请聆听您仆人的祈祷，愿它穿越格扎尔特默的无尽森林，抵达您的耳边！噩梦已变成了现实，黑暗也已离开了森林。但是，垂死太阳的光芒仍可以得到拯救！森林的中心在呼唤您……”
languages.original_text: "Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

traits.locale_text: “正在处理已获取的数据。填补空白数据……已完成。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置响了起来，他的声音略有变化。{/n}“噢，星裔，鹰神的天使，请聆听您仆人的祈祷，愿它穿越格扎尔特默的无尽森林，抵达您的耳边！噩梦已变成了现实，黑暗也已离开了森林。但是，垂死太阳的光芒仍可以得到拯救！森林的中心在呼唤您……”

languages.text: « Traitement des données recueillies. Restauration... Restauration terminée. » {n}La voix du prêtre change légèrement à travers le système-vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Ô Stellaire, émissaire céleste de l'Aigle-Dieu, entendez les prières que votre serviteur vous envoie à travers la canopée des forêts de Quetza Temer ! Le cauchemar est devenu réalité, les ténèbres ont quitté la forêt, mais il est encore possible de sauver la lumière de l'étoile mourante ! Le cœur de la forêt en appelle à vous... »
languages.original_text: "Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

traits.locale_text: « Traitement des données recueillies. Complétion des informations lacunaires... Opération terminée. » {n}La voix du prêtre change légèrement à travers le système-vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Ô Stellaire, émissaire céleste de l'Aigle-Dieu, entendez les prières que votre serviteur vous envoie à travers la canopée des forêts de Quetza Temer ! Le cauchemar est devenu réalité, les ténèbres ont quitté la forêt, mais il est encore possible de sauver la lumière de l'étoile mourante ! Le cœur de la forêt en appelle à vous... »

languages.text: 「取得したデータを処理します。修復中…修復完了」{n}かすかに変化した司祭の声が、パスカルのヴォクスシステムから聞こえてくる。{/n}「スターボーンよ、鷲神の天の先駆者よ、ケツァ・テメルの森の無数の民を通して其に送られた、其のしもべの祈りを聞きとどけたまえ！」 「悪夢は現実となり、闇は森を去った。しかし、滅びゆく星の光はまだ救われる！森の心は其を求めている…」
languages.original_text: "Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

traits.locale_text: 「取得したデータを加工する。データの空白を埋める…完了」{n}かすかに変化した司祭の声が、パスカルのヴォクスシステムから聞こえてくる。{/n}「スターボーンよ、鷲神の天の使者よ、ケツァ・テメルの森の無数の民を通して其に送られた、其のしもべの祈りを聞きとどけたまえ！」 「悪夢は現実となり、闇は森を去った。しかし、滅びゆく星の光はまだ救われる！森の心は其を求めている…」

languages.text: "Eingabedaten werden verarbeitet ... Wiederherstellen ... Wiederherstellung abgeschlossen." {n}Die leicht veränderte Stimme des Priesters ertönt aus Pasqals Voxsystem:{/n} "O Sternengeborener, Himmel-Herold des Adler-Gottes, hört die Gebete Eures Dieners, Euch geschickt durch die Wirren der Festungen von Quetza Temer! Der Albtraum ist Wirklichkeit geworden, die Dunkelheit hat den Wald verlassen. Doch das Licht des sterbenden Sterns kann noch gerettet werden! Das Herz des Waldes ruft nach Euch ..."
languages.original_text: "Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."

traits.locale_text: "Eingabedaten werden verarbeitet ... Datenlücken werden geschlossen ... Abgeschlossen." {n}Die leicht veränderte Stimme des Priesters ertönt aus Pasqals Voxsystem:{/n} "O Sternengeborener, Himmlischer Gesandter des Adler-Gottes, hört die Gebete Eures Dieners, Euch geschickt durch die Wirren der Festungen von Quetza Temer!" "Der Albtraum ist Wirklichkeit geworden, die Dunkelheit hat den Wald verlassen. Doch das Licht des sterbenden Sterns kann noch gerettet werden! Das Herz des Waldes ruft nach Euch ..."

languages.text: "Elde edilen veri işleniyor. Geri yükleniyor... Geri yükleme tamamlandı." {n}Pasqal'ın voks sisteminden rahibin hafifçe değiştirilmiş sesi yükseliyor.{/n} "Ey Kartal Tanrı'nın Gök Müjdecisi Yıldızdoğan, hizmetkârının Quetza Temer'in sayısız ormanı üzerinden sana ettiği dualarını duy! Kâbus gerçeğe döndü, karanlık ormanı azat etti ancak ölenlerin ışığı hâlâ kurtarılabilir! Ormanın kalbi seni çağırıyor..."
languages.original_text: "Processing acquired data. Restoring... Restoration complete." {n}The slightly altered voice of the priest comes from Pasqal's vox-system:{/n} "O Starborn, Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, hear the prayers of your servant, sent to you through the myriad forests of Quetza Temer! The nightmare has become real, the darkness has left the forest. But the light of the dying star can still be saved! The heart of the forest calls out for you..."
